Request Rest API¶

Overview

Resource Operation Description
RequestGet GET /requests/(scope)/(name)/(rse) list requests

Details

GET /requests/(scope)/(name)/(rse)¶

List request for given DID to a destination RSE.

Parameters:
  • scope – data identifier scope.
  • name – data identifier name.
  • rse – destination RSE.
Request Headers:
 
  • Content-Type – application/json
Status Codes:
  • 200 OK – Request found.
  • 404 Not Found – Request not found.
